children.name: Coke Rap
children.description: Lyrics with heavy reference to street-level drug dealing, specifically cocaine.

children.name: Mafioso Rap
children.description: Themed around organized crime, particularly the Mafia, often featuring cinematic production and lavish aesthetics.

children.name: Road Rap
children.description: Emerged in the mid 2000s from Brixton and Peckham featuring abrasive tones, prominent Grime influence, and lyrics depicting circumstances of street gang violence in the UK.

children.name: Scam Rap
children.description: Lyrics that focus on various forms of fraudulent activities.
